page.title: 07The Heybridge Hotel
page.content: Where the London road crosses the Hare, a tributary of the River Wid, a bridge was built and this 'Harebridge' became known as Heybridge. The only hotel in our area is here, on the site of a 15th century priory . It is conveniently situated for the M25 and the A12 London to Chelmsford road and offers many facilities. Apart from hotel and restaurant accommodation, up to 500 guests can be catered for at a dinner-dance. Parties in the restaurant can have a choice of 8 menus, while the Banqueting menu offers a choice of 36 different combinations. The hotel has new purpose-built facilities for meetings, seminars, training courses etc. and visitors are accommodated in 22 bedrooms which have bathroom, television, telephone and even a trouser press!
